mapper.insert: insert into review values ( '${memberId}', ${gservNo}, '${nickName}', '${rtitle}', '${rcontent}', '${rimg}', ${rstar}, 0, review_seq.nextval, 0, 0, sysdate, '${payCode}')
mapper.select: select rev.*, gs.gServTitle from review rev, gService gs where memberId = '${memberId}' and rev.gServNo = ${gservNo} and rev.payCode = '${payCode}' and rev.gServNo = gs.gServNo and rev.rstep=0
mapper.update: update review set rTitle ='${rtitle}', rContent='${rcontent}', rImg ='${rimg}', rStar =${rstar}, rHit=0, rGroup=${rgroup}, rStep=0, rIndent=0, rCredate=sysdate, payCode='${payCode}' where memberId='${memberId}' and gServNo=${gservNo} and rStep=0 and payCode ='${payCode}'
mapper.insert: insert into review values ( '${memberId}', ${gservNo}, '${nickName}', '', '${rcontent}', '', 0, 0, ${rgroup}, (select Max(rStep)+1 from review where gServNo=${gservNo} and rgroup = ${rgroup}), 0, sysdate, '${payCode}')
mapper.select: Select * From ( Select rownum rn, r.*,gs.gservTitle From review r, gservice gs Where rStep=0 and r.gservNo = gs.gservNo Order by rCredate desc ) where rn between ${start} and ${end}
Select count(*) From review Where rStep = 0

Select * From ( Select rownum rn, r.* From ( Select * From review Where gservNo = ${gservNo} Order by rGroup desc, rstep, rcredate ) r ) Where rn between ${start} and ${end}
